definition[0]: typical of or relating to men or boys
example[2]: Motor-racing has largely been a male preserve (=something that only men have been involved with).
definition[1]: a male person or animal cannot have babies or lay eggs
example[4]: Many women earn less than their male colleagues.
definition[2]: a male plant or flower cannot produce fruit
definition[3]: a male plug has parts that stick out and that fit into a hole or socket
example[5]: The male is usually bigger and more brightly coloured than the female.
example[6]: Police described her attacker as a white male aged about 25.
definition[5]: the capital city and main port of Maldives, on Mal√© Island in the Indian Ocean
